verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, alone Can turn our hearts from sin; His pow'r alone can sanctify And keep us pure within.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, alone Can deeper love inspire; His pow'r alone within our souls Can light the sacred fire.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, can bring The gifts we seek in pray'r; His voice can words of comfort speak, And still each wave of care.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, can give The grace we need this hour; And while we wait, O Spirit, come In sanctifying pow'r.
